description: This crispy roast pork and creamy butternut pumpkin recipe is a real crowd pleaser. Paired with a lentil and feta salad, it’s sure to hit the spot.
name: Roast Pork With Roasted Pumpkin & Rocket Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1kg butternut pumpkin, unpeeled, cut lengthways into 16 wedges, deseeded

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 240°C/220°C fan-forced. Place pork in a large baking dish. Pat rind dry with paper towels. Rub rind with 1 tbs oil. Sprinkle with salt flakes, fennel seeds and chilli, then season with pepper. Bake for 1 hour or until rind is golden and crisp.
Meanwhile, whisk vinegar, honey, mustard and remaining oil in a large bowl. Season.

Reduce oven to 200°C/180°C fan-forced. Line 2 baking trays with baking paper. Place pumpkin, in a single layer, on trays. Drizzle with 2 tbs honey mixture. Bake pork and pumpkin for a further 45 minutes or until pumpkin is tender and pork is cooked through. Cover pork loosely with foil and rest for 15 minutes. Thinly slice.
Meanwhile, add lentils, feta and rocket to remaining honey mixture, then toss to combine. Season with pepper.
Serve pork with pumpkin and rocket salad.
